name: Kenney's Roadtrip
description:
Kenney is on a roadtrip to see all the awesome games the participants of the Kenney Jam made. Keep Kenney's car on the road so more games can be played!

Kenney's Roadtrip was made as an entry for the Kenney Jam 2021. The theme was "ROTATION". Game Assets should only be used from Kenney Assets.

Controls:

  • R - Rotate
  • Enter - Place Tile

Known Bugs:

  • Sometimes the player randomly dies
  • Tiles can be placed inside other tiles

Team:

  • Adrian Bernhart (@TreesAreOp)
  • Circuitbree (@Circuitbree)
  • Jenny Neuhard (@Neisha)
